Salofalk<tm tmtype="reg"/> suppositories Indications and dose

Treatment of acute attack of mild to moderate ulcerative colitis affecting the rectum, sigmoid colon and descending colon

By rectum

  • Adult

    0.5–1 g 2–3 times a day, adjusted according to response, dose to be given using 500 mg suppositories.

Treatment of acute attack of mild to moderate ulcerative colitis affecting the rectum

By rectum

  • Adult

    1 g daily, preferably at bedtime, dose to be given using 1 g suppositories.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
